column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I don't care what some people say. I love this place. You think it's overpriced? I've been to tapas places that are way pricier
column3: and offer less to choose from on their menu. True
column5: but this place is huge and has tons of seating
column6: so as long as you go a little past prime dinner time
column8: you won't have to wait very long.
